entry.summary: 🚨 SCAM ALERT 🚨 We're seeing some fake D_D Twitter accounts pop up with a scam claim link in their bio. They're RT'ing and interacting with community posts. Please ensure you're only trusting officially channels: @developer_dao http://developerdao.com http://claim.developerdao.com
